site_title: Classique by Alain Georgeot & Eric Joisel

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: The 44th member of our 100 Exotic paper Airplane Line if is the Classique designed by Alain Georgeot & Eric Joisel. This origami paper airplane is well balances and could maintain flight. If you try to fold it it looks kind of similar to the Hunter designed by Kunihiko Kasahara. Let me know, which one do you prefer. You could review the Hunter here : https://youtu.be/KBk0ohOqNko If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 043 : The Cutter by Paul Jackson", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/A06-C7pYaD0 Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
